name: Raghul R
description: I am a software engineer with a passion for building web applications. I have experience in various technologies and frameworks, and I love to learn new things. In my free time, I enjoy reading books and exploring new places.

summary.summary: I'm a software engineer from Chennai, India. I'm fascinated by large-scale, high-impact products and contributed to major feature launches in industry-leading services.

techStacks.heading: Here are some technologies I have been working with:

description: Develop and maintain responsive, high-performance web applications using React.js, Next.js, and Typescript, improving user engagement by 15% through optimized UI components.
Collaborate with UX designers and product managers in agile sprints, driving UI refinements that improved customer satisfaction scores by 10%.
Contributed to A/B testing with Optimizely, driving data-informed UI improvements that increased conversion rates by 10%.
Conduct unit testing with Jest and React Testing Library, achieving 90%+ code coverage and minimizing production bugs.
Implemented performance monitoring with Grafana and Kibana, identifying bottlenecks in client applications and applying code-level optimizations to reduce latency by 15% for high-volume transactions.

Developed front-end features, components and pages by translating figma designs (UI/UX) and wireframes into high quality, reusable code optimized for maximum performance across various devices and browsers using Isomorphic React.

Collaborated with the content team to create custom CMS templates and themes for efficient content management system and provided training and support to non-technical users for CMS content editing and publishing.
Implemented static site generation for improved performance and SEO resulting in a 40% increase in website performance.
Designed and developed a reusable components and frontend libraries for future use, resulting in reduction in development time for new projects including multiple microsites.
Affiliated with a cross-functional team to design and implement user-friendly interfaces, ensuring seamless user experiences across various devices using Waterfall Methodologies.

Built and optimized server-side logic using Node.js and Express.js, integrating MongoDB to support dynamic content updates, which enhanced data retrieval efficiency for real-time reporting tools used by 10,000+ end users.
